# descfars : Build R Project (Course)  

 

The goal of descfars is to  present descriptive statistics for fars data.

## Installation

To install this package to run on your system, please first install and load the devtools package. Then you may install and load this package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MohsenSoltanifar/descfars")
```
